name: Scan and upload of bills
description: Given	  The user already login application and in Bills/Invoice list page

steps.name: When  The user  click on add button on Bill/Invoice list page
Then  The application views upload bills/Invoice page
And  The user need to Select the particular bill to upload by clicking browse option or Drag and Drop or OCR
And  user need to fill in the vendor and account details and click save

fullName: To Test Functional Testing For BillManagement Application: Scan and upload of bills
